responses.title: Zet is the Self, and the Self is Zet.
The Self seeks to end the great schism.
Matter has been split from its intended form. These must be made to unite.
Self unites with Radiant self. For now.
Self bonds with Dire self. For the moment.
Selves are in agreement: this one is in the bag.
This disharmony must resolve, or be crushed.
Diruulth and Radinthul, your conflicts must be ended.
The destruction of the Ancients begins.
Their Ancient must shatter and burn.
Great upheaval shall lay their Ancient to waste.
Ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha!
Hm hm hm hm hm hm hm hm hm hm hm hm hm.
Hm hm hm hm hm hm hm hm hm hm hm hm.
Mercy is yours, for the end comes.
No one to blame but yourself.
You are now the ward of death itself.
You meet your true self at last.
Life is prison. You are free.
You will just have to accept this, and move on.
Hm hm hm hm hm hm hm hm hm hm hm hm hm hm hm hm hm!
All that is green returns to dust.
Hm hm hm hm hm hm hm hm hm hm hm hm hm.
Hm hm hm hm hm hm hm.
Hm hm hm hm hm hm hm hm hm hm hm hm hm.
Hm hm hm hm hm hm hm hm hm.
Hm hm hm hm ho ho ha ha ha ha ha ha ha!
Hm hm hm hm hm hm hm hm hm hm hm hm hm hm hm.
Titan, let us unify what has been torn apart.
Phoenix, your light glittered from afar as Self traveled the cosmos.
Timeless one, perhaps the end finally draws nigh.
This will change the course of battle.
What was paid with gold, the Dire shall pay with lives.
The Radiant shall regret this turn.
The Self has lost its self.
You know not what you do.
Victory walks upon a wire. The Self must not fail.
These fools must learn what they stand against.
Such life is and can be when it is given by a foe.
One divided against its Self cannot stand.
What was none becomes one again.
The Self is because it believes it is.
From the Primordial Consciousness all came. Return to it, all must.
It is not to aid the Ancients that this war is joined, but to destroy them both. This disunity must end.
There can be no hesistation. Dire must be extinguished just as the Radiant.
Radiant aids its enemy, but does not yet know it.
One Ancient is destroyed. One remains.
The Dire has gone down in flames.
The Dire are no more. Yet there is still much to be done.
The Radiant are ended. Yet this is not over.
